Home.i-will-be-your-guide: I'll be your guide on this journey through Robin's world! But who is he?
Home.know-more: Would you like to get to know him a little better?
Home.know-more-description: I took the liberty of asking Robin a few questions straight away. Let's find out who's behind this portfolio!
Home.question-1: What type of career opportunity are you looking for?
Home.answer-1: I am seeking an opportunity as a product-oriented Frontend Engineer with a focus on UX. I enjoy working on complex web products, where the frontend is not limited to integration but plays a key role in understanding business needs and user experience. I want to work closely with product and technical teams to build reliable, maintainable and user-friendly applications, using React, Next.js and TypeScript in particular.
Home.question-2: Okay top! And if you had a choice of several opportunities, what criteria would you use to make your choice?
Home.answer-2: If I had a choice between several opportunities, I would pay particular attention to product quality, collaboration between the product, design and development teams, and the importance placed on code quality and maintainability. I would also pay attention to the team's mindset, the clarity of the product vision, and the company's ability to offer a healthy working environment conducive to long-term progress.
Home.question-3: Very good, we can see that you know what you want! Do you have any hobbies outside work?
Home.answer-3: Sport is an integral part of my balance. I practise it almost daily, including tai chi, basketball, competitive volleyball, rollerblading and surfing (a passion that motivated my decision to move to Bordeaux).
Home.question-4: Top! Do you have a special or unusual talent that you'd like to share with us?
Home.answer-4: It might sound counter-intuitive for a developer, but I'm an energeticist and a musician! I like the very logical, down-to-earth side of web development, but I also like human contact and sharing my creativity! It's this combination that allows me to express who I am and finally find a balance in my life!
Home.question-5: Really interesting! And finally: Star Wars or Lord of the Rings?
Home.answer-5: Lord of the Rings without hesitation! ‘I can read in your eyes the same fear that could seize my heart. A day may come when the courage of men fails and we abandon our friends. But that day has not come!’ Chills guaranteed ahah!

SkillsPage.creativity-description: It's thanks to music that he's been able to develop and trust his creativity!
SkillsPage.curiosity-description: He developed his curiosity out of a desire to understand the world and others!
SkillsPage.stress-management-description: Thanks to meditation and his ability to take a step back from a situation, he has developed his ability to manage stress.
SkillsPage.humility-description: It was through sport that he realized that there will always be someone better than him, and that humility was the way to accept and see himself as he is.
SkillsPage.communication-description: By working with many different trades, he was able to understand the impact of good communication on the smooth running of a project.
SkillsPage.autonomy-description: In his previous company, he didn't have a more experienced front-end developer than himself, so he had to develop his autonomy in order to find solutions to the problems he encountered.
SkillsPage.check-his-skills: Is your visit going well? I can see that you like things concrete, so let's take a look at his technical skills together!
SkillsPage.check-his-soft-skills2: But who's the human behind it all? As a robot, I'm curious, aren't you? I invite you to click on each soft skill to find out more about Robin!

ProjectsPage.check-his-projects: Here you'll find the projects he's been working on. But being a perfectionist, he's only taking on one for the moment !

ExperiencesPage.front-end-developper-experience: Development of web projects in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, with a focus on performance, SEO, and user experience. Creation of a portfolio and professional showcase website, integration of third-party APIs (Google Maps, Google Calendar), implementation of cross-functional features (light/dark theme, i18n), and attention to the quality and maintainability of frontend code.
ExperiencesPage.fullstack-developper-experience: Participation in the redesign of a SaaS application based on a Symfony backend, with gradual migration to a modern frontend in React and TypeScript. Development of frontend features from scratch based on Figma mockups, with a particular focus on user experience, edge case management, and error states. Integration of key business features (dynamic forms with real-time validation, PDF reader for quote and invoice automation) and close collaboration with Symfony backend teams for API integration and functional consistency.
ExperiencesPage.fullstack-web-developper-experience: Integration of Figma mockups into a SaaS application in JavaScript, SCSS, and Twig. Participation in the implementation of a multilingual translation system under Symfony. Refactoring of legacy JavaScript code, with the division of a monolithic file into more readable and maintainable modules.
ExperiencesPage.junior-web-developper-experience: Professional training with the completion of concrete web projects: responsive HTML/CSS integration, WordPress showcase site, JavaScript application (OOP), PHP blog, and redesign of an association website using Symfony.
ExperiencesPage.career-path: Here you find more about his background, including his professional experience and training!

ContactPage.contact-him: Does his world appeal to you and do you have an opportunity that matches his profile? Then send him a message!
ContactPage.your-message-placeholder: Example : I have an opportunity for you
ContactPage.success-message: Thank you for your time! Your message has been sent, Robin will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.error-message: An error has occurred while sending your message. Please do not hesitate to contact Robin directly by email. You'll find his email address at the bottom of the page.

LegalNotices.legal-notices-description: We would like to provide you with transparent information about the legal aspects of his site. Please take a moment to read the following information.
LegalNotices.intellectual-property-description: The content of this site, including texts, images, videos and other elements, is protected by intellectual property laws. All rights are reserved. You are not authorized to reproduce, distribute or use the content of this site without his written authorization.
LegalNotices.data-collection-description: When you visit his site, it may collect certain personal information in accordance with the data protection policy. For more information on the collection and use of your personal data, please refer to this page
LegalNotices.responsibility-description: He does his best to provide accurate and up-to-date information on this site. However, it cannot guarantee the accuracy, relevance or completeness of this information. As a visitor, you are responsible for your use of the information presented on this site.
LegalNotices.external-links-description: This site may contain links to external websites. he is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such sites, and I encourage you to consult their own privacy policies and legal notices.
LegalNotices.contact-description: If you have any questions about these legal notices or the site in general, please do not hesitate to contact him at the following e-mail address: poncon.robin@gmail.com or directly at

DataProtectionPage.welcome-data-protection: Welcome to the data protection page. I would like to assure you that Robin takes the privacy and security of your personal information very seriously. The purpose of this privacy policy is to inform you about how Robin collects, uses, shares and protects your data.
DataProtectionPage.when-you-visit: When you visit its website, it may collect certain personal information, including :
DataProtectionPage.identification-information-description: : Your last name, first name, e-mail address and any other contact details you choose to provide via the contact form.
DataProtectionPage.navigation-data-description: : Information collected automatically when you visit our site, such as your IP address, the type of browser you use, the pages you visit and how you interact with our site.
DataProtectionPage.use-your-data-for: He uses the personal data collected for the following purposes :
DataProtectionPage.answering-your-request-description: : If you contact him via his contact form, he uses your information to answer your questions or requests.
DataProtectionPage.improving-his-website-description: : He may use browsing data to understand how visitors use its website and improve it accordingly.
DataProtectionPage.sharing-your-data-description: He doesn't share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
DataProtectionPage.legal-obligations-description: : He may be required to disclose your information if required by law.
DataProtectionPage.data-security-description: He takes appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against loss, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure, and he cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
DataProtectionPage.your-rights-description: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, object to or request the portability of your personal data. To exercise these rights, or if you have any questions about our data protection policy, please contact us using the contact details provided on our website.
DataProtectionPage.policy-changes-description: He reserves the right to update this data protection policy at any time to reflect changes in its practices or legal requirements. I encourage you to visit this page regularly to stay informed about how he protects your data.

NotFoundPage.you-are-lost: It seems you've lost your way in a parallel universe! Click on the button below to return to your previous destination.
